reviewText:
This game could be cool but it definitely needs some more work.

The art style is very nice, and I really like that. THe sound effects seem okay, but that battle start" sound is so loud and horrible.

There needs to be more explanation of what's going on

reviewText: Fun game that leaves you to decide where to go and how many risks to take. You enter a rather large map that has numerous small buildings in it. You choose where to go and what ones to enter. Once you go in, enemies will spawn and attack you, killing them causes them to drop coins, health potions or keys. On the map there will be locked chests and building that you can explore so long as you have a key to unlock them. You can clear all or none of the buildings before battling the boss. These guys will drop items to enhance your skills including armors and weapons. Once dead a portal will open to take you to the next area.\n\nI think this is a competent and very well priced little game that deserves a look, It can be compared to Ziggurat only in that its a rouge-lite FPS and that you are a mage. otherwise its quite different. Recommended!
